div.span: The Wise County School Board will hold a Public Hearing on its 2020 - 2021 school budget on Tuesday, May 5 @ 6:00 p.m., in the Education Center.

img.alt: Wise County Public Schools’ Lighthouse Logo

div.span:
Wise County Public Schools will continue meal service during school closure. In consideration of the Governor’s issuance of a Stay at Home Order and to assist our community and staff members minimize contact, starting Wednesday April 8, meals will be provided one day per week. Five breakfasts and five lunches will be provided for each child on Wednesday each week.
Meals will be available for drive through pick up from 11:00am – 1:00pm at the following locations: Coeburn Primary, ...

img.alt: Image of a child holding blocks that spell out the word learn

div.span:
The Title VI-B Special Education Annual Plan is available for review and comments until May 8, 2020.
Contact Jerrie Adams at jadams@wisek12.org or call 276.328.8017, Ext. 1012 if you have any questions or wish to obtain a copy for review.

div.p:
Students and their families are encouraged to use a variety of information sources
to select a college and major. The State Council of Higher Education for Virginia (SCHEV) provides one such source that is available here.

Wise County Public Schools is updating this website to ensure compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. In the interim, website accessibility concerns may be brought to the attention of Scott Kiser, Director of Technology for Wise County Public Schools.
